entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
